ShortDescription: One stop people solutions provider through 4 business verticals namely Strategic HR, CORE HR, TA & Catalyst .
enhanced_description: Phiedge, also known as PHI Edge, is a 10-year-old HR consulting LLP firm established in 2010. It is managed by three directors (Anoop Ramachandran, Vibha Anoop, and Amitabha Sen) with over 70 years of combined people expertise. Phiedge operates as a one-stop people solutions provider, focusing on talent enhancement through four business verticals: Strategic HR, CORE HR, Talent Acquisition (TA), and Catalyst. The firm delivers end-to-end HR services, employs a 'Diagnose/Design/Deliver' methodology, and aims to offer the highest Return on Investment (ROI) in the industries it serves. Phiedge has 25+ employees and many associates.
key_use_cases: Boosting hiring manager confidence and productivity
Developing HR strategies using a Diagnose/Design/Deliver approach
competitive_advantages: Over 70 years of combined leadership expertise in people management
Focus on delivering high Return on Investment (ROI) for clients
Comprehensive 'one-stop' solution across various HR verticals
implementation_scenarios: Consulting-led HR strategy development and execution
Project-based HR solutions following a Diagnose/Design/Deliver methodology
roi_benefits: High Return on Investment (ROI) across industries
Faster and more efficient top talent acquisition
Increased hiring manager confidence and productivity
